algorithm_technique: Depth First Search (DFS) starting from ocean borders.
problem_summary_simple: Find cells from which water can flow to both Pacific and Atlantic oceans.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DFS from Pacific and Atlantic borders to mark reachable cells, then finds intersection.
key_insights: Instead of checking flow from each cell to both oceans, it's more efficient to check flow from oceans to cells.
Perform DFS/BFS from cells adjacent to the Pacific Ocean and then from cells adjacent to the Atlantic Ocean.
A cell is a valid result if it's reachable from both oceans.
